metadata.name: Birdeye
metadata.description: Comprehensive Solana token analytics with price data, OHLCV charts, wallet tracking, and trader profiles. Premium data source for Solana ICM analysis.
metadata.author: gICM

tools.name: getTokenPrice
tools.description: Get current token price with 24h change and volume

tools.name: getTokenOHLCV
tools.description: Get OHLCV candles for chart analysis (1m to 1M intervals)

tools.name: getTokenTrades
tools.description: Get recent trades with buyer/seller addresses

tools.name: getTokenHolders
tools.description: Get top token holders with balances and percentages

tools.name: getWalletPortfolio
tools.description: Analyze wallet holdings and PnL for whale tracking

tools.name: getTraderProfile
tools.description: Get trader stats: win rate, total PnL, trade count

tools.name: getTokenSecurity
tools.description: Security audit data: mint authority, freeze authority, LP burned

tools.name: getMarketOverview
tools.description: Get Solana market overview and trending tokens

tools.name: getNewTokens
tools.description: Track newly created tokens for ICM opportunities

tools.name: getTokenMetadata
tools.description: Get token name, symbol, decimals, logo, socials

pricing.note: Pro tier includes historical data and WebSocket feeds

steps: Navigate to API section in dashboard
